text: IIIT Lucknow entrance gate IIIT Lucknow main building Indian Institute of Information Technology, Lucknow (IIIT Lucknow or IIIT-L) is an Indian Institute of Information Technology in Lucknow that focuses on Information Technology. For its first academic session 2015–16, classes started from mentor Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad's campus. The Institute is being set up with the financial contributions of Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD) - Government of India, Government of Uttar Pradesh and U. P. Electronics Corporation as industry partner. The new campus of IIIT Lucknow would be located in IT City in Lucknow. It offers B.Tech, M.Tech and PhD courses in Information Technology and Computer Science . ==References== https://news.careers360.com/nmims-chief-academic-officer- appointed-founding-director-iiit-lucknow ==External links== * Lucknow Category:Universities and colleges in Lucknow Category:Deemed universities in India Category:Engineering colleges in Lucknow Category:Educational institutions established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in India
title: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Lucknow
